Viewing Label Properties

A view label’s properties include its name, description, frozen/unfrozen status, configuration, and build label status. A revision label's properties include its name, description, and frozen/unfrozen status.

To review a label’s properties:

  1. Select the appropriate folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Label tab to display a list of labels.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a label.

    • Select a label from the list box.

    A dialog box appears, listing the label's properties.

  4. Click OK to close the dialog box.
